DataElement.preferredName: Concomitant Medication Concomitant Medication Flag java.lang.Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Concomitant; following as a consequence.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products._Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Concomitant; following as a consequence.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products._Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Concomitant; following as a consequence.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/1/11 Released as part of Lymphoma Enterprise Architecture Data System (LEADS) model cleanup.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
